CHART OF ACCOUNTS ORGANIZATION
Recommends that you organize your accounts by main account number. Here is an
example of one possible method of numbering accounts:

Asset Accounts 1000 to 1999
Liability Accounts 2000 to 2999
Owner’s Equity
Accounts
3000 to 3999
Revenue Accounts 4000 to 4999
Cost of Sales
Accounts
5000 to 5999
Expense Accounts 6000 to 6999


SOURCE:
http://www.pass-port.com/docs/general_ledger.pdf
http://www.accountingcoach.com/balance-sheet/explanation
http://www.accountingcoach.com/balance-sheet/explanation/2
http://www.accountingcoach.com/balance-sheet/explanation/3
